rows.label: qst702304_msg0001
rows.name:
If you see a soldier named
Meknes, please tell me. Any
information will do.

rows.label: qst702304_msg0002
rows.name:
No ships have left recently. He might
have headed for the capital, or be on
his way... He should still be in Iira.

rows.label: qst702304_msg0003
rows.name: I hope he's just lost somewhere...

rows.label: qst702304_msg0101
rows.name:
Meknes is... dead? Killed
by a ferocious monster...?

rows.label: qst702304_msg0102
rows.name:
...He was frail and not good at combat.
If he was attacked by a superior opponent,
he wouldn't have stood a chance.

rows.label: qst702304_msg0103
rows.name:
Why did he wander off alone...?
What was he thinking? Why...

rows.label: qst702304_msg0105
rows.name:
...Well, there's no use
regretting it now. All I can
do is live for his sake...

rows.label: qst702304_msg0106
rows.name:
I will devote myself even
more to my duties. Thank
you for letting me know.
